DOC.brief_summary: A multiple ascending dose study evaluate safety , tolerability , pharmacokinetics CD101 Injection Healthy Subjects .
DOC.brief_title: An Ascending Multiple Dose Study CD101 IV Healthy Subjects
DOC.detailed_description: This Phase 1 , single-center , prospective , randomize , double-blind study multiple ascending dos ( MAD ) CD101 Injection administer IV healthy adult subject . In study , subject 3 cohort 8 subject randomize receive multiple IV dose CD101 Injection placebo infusion . Dose level CD101 Injection assess follow ascend multiple-dose regimen .
DOC.criteria: Men must surgically sterilize use contraception , No significant finding physical exam , ECG , clinical laboratory test , Body mass index ( BMI ) 18.5 32.0 kg/m2 , inclusive Must provide write informed consent Females child bear potential Signs symptom acute illness chronic disease Use prescription medication within 28 day Use OTC , supplement , herbal within 14 day Current smoker Previous participation clinical study within 28 day
